Nightshift looks over to Nightlight, seeing an opportunity to try his skill=
s at teaching the art of the Ninjabot to Nightlight, which would enhance he=
r skill level considerably.  It was all about speed, precision, balance, di=
scipline, grace, and of course effectiveness.

He could see potential in he=
r and turns his head in both Nightlight and Bumps direction.

" Bump's righ=
t, that's somethn' ya gotta learn, but I see a lotta potential for train'n =
ya as a Ninjabot.  You got the right moves, mody, and grace, and once you'r=
e trained, there's gonna be no stopp'n you Nightlight.  Master Yokitron onc=
e said, that a student often shows potential even if they don't realize it =
themselves.  Now, that's totally up to you if ya want the training, just se=
e me after we get repaired, and I'll set up a training program for ya.  Hmm=
, maybe Rodimus might wanna join in on it too..  It's a perfect opportunity=
 for both of you ta get some extra training under your belts."

He position=
s himself again.

" It would really help both of you out a lot, see'n what =
Hydras managed ta pull on ya in the past.  The reason why it didn't work on=
 Tucson or me, is that Master Yokitron's training sorta prepared us spiritu=
ally for what could come down the pike.  Clear minds empty of thoughts are =
less likely ta get infected by negative influences, simply because there's =
no thought energy ta hold onto.  Clear mind, clear soul, clear spark.  Bad =
stuff just goes in one way, and out the other.  You guys had a lot on your =
minds when Hydras took you.  And that couldn't be helped, but now it can be=
.  I bet my spark plugs that if you and Rodimus train with me, I can get bo=
th of ya up ta our level and that'll make you a pair of the strongest Autob=
ots this side of the galaxy, but not the type of strength most warriors per=
ceive.  This type of strength is the strength of spirit, inner peace, and h=
armony.  A perfect balance between spark, soul, and mind.  And yeah, there'=
s a lotta dexterity aquired in Ninjabot training, the type of dexterity tha=
t makes even Tucson Prime a bit different then the traditional Autobot Comm=
ander.  It's a difference Hydras has no inclination how ta fend off. THAT'S=
 the direction Tucson is gonna take, and if you guys were trained in our ar=
t, so more power to ya."

He then looks to Bump, as the repair bench does i=
ts job to repair the internal damages done to him.

" Speakn' of performanc=
e, that reminds me...  I need new hydraulic shock absorbers, timing belt, a=
nd I know my struts need work, new tires, body work, and Ty Rods fixed.  Oh=
 yeah, need a new front and back end alignment too."

To repair the damgage=
s to his alt form, he now transforms into his vehicle mode, to prepare for =
the rest of his repairs.  He also notices a busted headlight on the left si=
de.

"Scrap, throw in a new headlight for the left side, new bumpers, front=
, back, side, and awww slag, transmission's actn' up.  Probably because I s=
macked that tree real hard in alt form. After this is all done, I am so gon=
na give those preds the bill, literally.  In other words, I need a total ov=
erhaul ta my alt form.  And if you can help it, I'd like ta hold onta this =
one for a while."
